documentType: prisoner processing forms and arrest warrant
summary: This document is a collection of U.S. Marshals Service and Bureau of Prisons forms related to the arrest and initial incarceration of Jeffrey Epstein in July 2019. It includes his prisoner remand form, arrest warrant, medical release form, property record, and custody alerts, detailing his charges and processing into the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC). This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons administrative records for inmate Jeffrey Epstein, including a disciplinary record check, personal property record, prisoner remand forms, and an inmate profile. It details his incarceration at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York (MCC New York) in 2019, listing his charges, physical description, and housing assignment.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The primary subject of all administrative records; incarcerated at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York (MCC New York) under register number 76318-054, charged with trafficking conspiracy and trafficking of minors.

persons.name: Barbara Moses
persons.context: Signed the arrest warrant for Jeffrey Epstein on July 2, 2019, authorizing his arrest based on an indictment.

persons.name: N. Reid
persons.context: Listed as the Unit Manager for Epstein's housing unit (Unit 5N) at MCC New York, with contact extension provided.

events.title: Arrest Warrant Issued
events.description: A United States magistrate judge (Barbara Moses) issued an arrest warrant for Jeffrey Epstein based on an indictment for sex trafficking conspiracy and sex trafficking of minors.

events.title: Epstein Arrest and Intake
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was arrested and processed into custody. The prisoner remand form indicates an arrest date of July 6, 2019, and intake into the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC).

events.title: CMC Assignment
events.description: Epstein received a CMC (Correctional Management Classification) assignment at the MCC, as recorded in the clearance data.

events.title: Multiple Administrative Updates
events.description: Several inmate profile categories (custody, education, financial responsibility, medical, program review) were updated for Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Admission and Assignment
events.description: Epstein was admitted and assigned to pre-sentencing status in the Care Level 1 - Mental Health unit (Unit 5N) at MCC New York.

events.title: Case Manager Assignment
events.description: A case manager was assigned to Epstein's case at MCC New York.

events.title: Counselor and Casework Updates
events.description: Updates were made to Epstein's correctional counselor and caseworker assignments.

events.title: Program Review
events.description: A program review was conducted for inmate Epstein.

events.title: Scheduled Program Review
events.description: An October program review was scheduled for inmate Epstein.

locations: NYM-NEW YORK MCC (Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was arrested on July 6, 2019, on charges of sex trafficking conspiracy (18 USC 371) and sex trafficking of minors (18 USC 1591).
His federal prisoner number was 76318-054, and he was designated with a 'Sex Offense Alert' by the U.S. Marshals Service.
The arrest warrant was signed by Magistrate Judge Barbara Moses on July 2, 2019, in the Southern District of New York.
Epstein's listed residence at the time of arrest was New York, NY 10021.
Prisoner processing documents include a medical release form and a detailed inventory of his personal property upon intake.
Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated under BOP register number 76318-054 at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York (MCC New York).
His listed charges are 'Trafficking Consp. Trafficking of Minors' and he was in pre-sentencing status.
Epstein was housed in a Care Level 1 - Mental Health unit (Unit 5N), specifically in House 2, Range 04, Bed 206L AD.
An inmate personal property record (HP-A0383) was created, noting no personal property items were received or claimed at the time of the record.
The documents show a series of administrative updates and reviews for Epstein in July 2019, shortly before his death in August 2019.
